participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Reflective and a bit melancholic, longing for connection and activity.
participant_1.background: i have two grown children who never visit. i used to be pretty but time has not been kind. i'm a 56 year old woman. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and vibrant, always looking for ways to engage and connect with others.
participant_2.background: i'm married. i'm a vegetarian. my favorite color is blue. i am a woman.
